answers.answer: I would mention it to your Dr just to be on the safe side because dizzy can be normal or problematic... Have you had any issues with your bp?
Yeah I have an appointment on Friday, see if I can wait it out until then. Nope, no other problems :)

If your blood pressure has been good then you  probably have nothing to worry about. I had that too. I was worried about preeclampsia because I had slightly elevated blood pressure at times... But it turns out it was just a annoying pregnancy symptom. Definitely mention it to your OB. Make sure you stay hydrated and eat.
Yeah I was a bit worried about that too, that's why I asked. But haven't had any other symptoms :) Thank you :)
You could be lacking iron or sugar is low or simply dehydration.

question: So, all day I've been having dizzy spells come and go. It feels like the whole world is spinning too fast and makes me feel sick. I sit down and close my eyes and it goes away, but it just keeps coming back. Anyone else gone through this? Should I be worried?   I'm 37+2
title: Dizzy spells at 37 weeks?
